emptyStateBullets: Identify food sensitivities and how they affect your energy and mood.
Monitor macronutrient balance and portion control for weight management.
Build sustainable healthy eating habits through mindful awareness.
generated_config.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this food entry?
generated_config.emptyStateDescription: Tracking your diet helps you identify patterns between what you eat and how you feel, while ensuring you meet your nutritional goals.

generated_config.notesPlaceholder: Record your Systolic/Diastolic (e.g., 130/85) and any symptoms.
emptyStateBullets: Identify trends and spikes throughout the day
Monitor the effectiveness of lifestyle changes or medication
Share an accurate history with your medical team
generated_config.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this blood pressure entry?
generated_config.emptyStateDescription: Consistently logging your readings helps you and your healthcare provider manage your heart health and identify long-term patterns.

entries.notes: I have been sleeping poorly for many weeks and I feel weak when I wake. I haven't eaten much and I have tried to stay on my sofa but am in agony
Cannot stand for too long today so everything as usual like going to the toilet has been a case of only getting off the sofa if absolutely necessary.

Got at most 4 hours sleep. I have been sleeping/living on my sofa for years now because my bed makes my pain worse and just getting from my bedroom to my lounge and vice-versa is painful. As well as physical triggers, stress has made the pain unbearable today and my medication does nothing to help. I am supposed to have a medication review but even after I got my mum to post a letter from adult mental health directly to my GP surgery, nothing has been actioned and I have been unable to call at 8am or 1pm mostly due to having nothing on my mind except pain and poor mental health, plus unpredictable sleep patterns. No matter how much I try to get to bed and set an alarm, my sleep is terrible. When the alarms go off it takes what feels like a long time to wake up at which point I'm so dazed and confused that I eventually manage to press to stop the alarm.

Today has been agony on top of specific unexpected stress triggers

Woke up at 06:40 in pain. I remember checking the time before trying for a number of times to get to sleep. It was around 03:20. Tried getting back to sleep but the pain is so bad that I can’t relax. I took painkillers. I will be like a zombie today and I can’t nap because it’s Christmas Eve and the only day I can get my prescription. I’m still stressed by an unexpected event.

Christmas Day with my mum was peaceful and relaxing but it meant moving around a lot more than usual and I had 4 hours sleep so my entire system was stressed on top of my daily pain. I’m resting and it’s supposed to be a relief but I’m in pain in whichever position. I have pillows, cushions but it’s not enough. I am going to be wiped out for days and I know that because it has happened every time I’ve over exerted myself. It’s very depressing that I’m so limited all the time.

I’ve been in a deep depression for months but I only just got this app which makes it easy to track my mental health. Christmas Day and even though I’m extremely grateful for my mother being with me, the other family members who are absent I miss all the more. I’m in the dark about my future and I’ve been planning for a time when I can’t take life anymore. The only reason today isn’t the lowest possible was because my mother made sure I had a nice Christmas dinner and someone to talk with. The older I get the less I’m able to express my feelings but my mum doesn’t need me to explain anything she’s just there for me. I’m beyond grateful.

Couldn’t get to sleep even after taking my sleeping pill. I’m confused because I think it’s technically now way over 24 hours of sleep so now I’m very awake or definitely can’t get back to sleep and my body doesn’t know what it wants because it’s dark so my plan is to stay up long enough to reset to regular hours but I’m not sure if I’ll be able to so I’m already anxious about trying.

I just woke up after oversleeping for many hours so my body hadn’t had any painkillers until about ten minutes ago but because my system is still waking up it’s not letting my brain know the full extent of my pain levels yet which is why it’s difficult to pick a number so 7 is my best guess because I’m not fully awake. I’m currently experiencing waves of pain. It took about 20 minutes to go to the toilet because I couldn’t go and then I was so weak that it took a long time to get up off the toilet and navigate back to my sofa. I was off balance as usual but because my system isn’t fully awake yet I fell twice and had to grab the wall and the side of the bath to get myself up to grab the bathroom radiator which is higher and my only option because I was on my knees which was extremely painful. I think it took longer than 20 minutes but I’m so discombobulated it’s hard to be accurate.

I miss my son and I pretend he doesn’t exist to deal with it. My dad had a mini stroke a few days ago and I’m so afraid he’ll get worse like last time but he’s much older now. He doesn’t care about himself he doesn’t know he’s loved even though I’ve been sending him a Father’s Day gift and a birthday gift. I fear the time. I’m trying to get through each day but it’s never without crying and panic attacks.
Agony from oversleeping after trying to reset. The pain is too much to manage anything detailed. I’m in agony
Overslept. In agony. Didn’t take long to start crying and self hating.
Just had some homemade stew from my slow cooker. Feeling like I ate well.

After staying awake for around 19 hours I thought it would reset my sleep. I woke up several times but I was so weak I fell asleep without even touching my alarm which was going off for hours and hours. Woke up 8pm very confused and distressed. Took medication. I'm going to try to sleep now but I am scared I won't wake up even in the early afternoon, which would be far better than 8pm. Life stress and depression are definitely factors. I think my system is keeping me from facing life by keeping me asleep. Unfortunately this is part of a long history for me and I know that it is also part of my chronic fatigue. I had many dreams about my past which started off well but ultimately ended friendships when I was young. When I woke up before sleeping again the memories from the dreams were punishing and filled me with more self-hate.
After only having 4 hours sleep my body has been screaming in pain at me all day. Difficulty going to the toilet, lack of motivation to eat and a very low mood
Extremely low. Suicidal thoughts
Haven’t eaten anything that I can remember today. My pain and mental health are at their worst
I had slightly more sleep last night which has meant that even though my baseline is being in pain, it's not as intense at the moment. Getting the right amount of sleep makes a difference.

Unfortunately I suffer every day but getting slightly better sleep has made a little difference. I chose calm from the categories because I feel numb as opposed to having any extreme or desperate thoughts. I feel like I am looking at myself from a different angle like being awake right now isn't real, like I'm still asleep but my eyes are open. I continue to feel sad because I don't know when I'm going to see my son or see my dad. I wish I had the strength alone to move on from this constant depression, but I've been depressed for over 20 years, or I've had an undiagnosed mood disorder. At one point I was bipolar, now I might be ADHD. I have to wait for 4 years until I'll be able to see a professional and I don't know if I'll even get a diagnosis. Without a diagnosis I can't truly function as normal, whatever my normal is.

As I’ve mentioned in my other trackers, last night I slept better. I’ve chosen 5 because I did wake up a few times but I was able get back to sleep so I got more restful sleep and I’m assuming deeper sleep because I don’t remember having any dreams. Please let me sleep like this or better because it makes a difference. I know from my past that it might not continue but I’m going to try to do exactly what I did last night before sleeping.
My mother brought me a salad and I've had more water than usual
I overslept from physical exhaustion. Can’t remember my nightmare but I had at least one. Tracking is useful but upsetting for the most part.

Very difficult getting to sleep last night because lots of noise from celebrations then pain kept waking me up so I took painkillers. Have hardly moved, exhausted. Poor sleep and chronic pain go hand in hand

Usual amount of pain but worse because I had to do a little walking to see my mum yesterday. I still feel self conscious and extremely anxious when I need to walk even a little bit especially with my walking stick and I feel so defeated because I have to take breaks every small amount of distance covered. Being self conscious makes me overdo it and I always pay for it several days after. I was physically exhausted and even though I still had trouble getting to sleep my body had to keep me asleep for much longer than I would have wanted. The painkillers hardly touch it and I’m definitely due a review for my medication. I don’t see any choice but to either get extra meds or ask for an increase in strength to the ones I’ve been taking for around 5 years after trying an alternative before, which ended up not working. I’ll be taking everything slowly for at least a week and I already take it slowly.

I can’t stop thinking about my dad. After having a mini stroke which was in the post for years he has resumed his drinking and my mum says he eats at McDonald’s every day. Because I know him much more than he thinks I know him, as well as feeling despair at what seems like reckless stupidity, he’s anything but. He knows what he’s doing and he’s fearlessly pressing on because he knows it will end him. I have one major theory about what happened to him and many other boys who attended boarding school during his childhood. I didn’t think about it at the time but he kept watching a certain film and singing big boys don’t cry. I think he was trying to tell me something or anyone who would listen. I was always the one who understood the dynamics of family conflicts as a child, so he said. I was thoughtful at the time but I was eventually broken by the chaos and I had my own crisis, one after the other which led me into depression and unorganised thoughts, an inner chaos that I couldn’t reason my way out of. I think that my patterns of thought, overthinking and intellect came from him. It’s his resolve that I can’t help admiring along with fearing his wilful path to an end. The thing is, because I know where my patterns of thinking are from, I know that as well as the resolve to continue into oblivion lies a deeply buried need to be loved and accepted. And I want to give him that but every time I have in the past he has responded with the only way he knows, dominant behaviour. And I can’t let go. I’ve been beaten and bullied so much, mostly at school, that as an adult I have found myself watching a man who cannot allow himself to be so vulnerable and it’s crazy, because I know I’m the way I am and it’s fearing myself so much that I can’t fall into weakness again. It’s a total headfuck to hold two opposing sides of awareness and be paralysed by them.

The stew my mum made me when she came here was running out but she made it easy for me to top it up because she prepared a lot of ingredients, mostly vegetables and stored them in containers in the fridge. So all I had to do was top it up and add more water and change from keep warm to slow cook. Unfortunately other things, mental health, pain, lack of sleep meant that my memory for maintaining the stew slipped and so, can't remember which day, I ate nothing for a while and only topped the stew up when I was hungry and realised I had nothing. So I had some a little earlier with bread... which was mouldy so I picked the mould off and ate it anyway. My stomach is feeling weird now and I'm really put off but if I'm able to manage out of desperation I'll try to eat again today. Also it's new year's eve and I haven't got any other food so I'll have to decide if I eat again or not, because I won't have anything and I guess even an emergency take away won't be an option tomorrow. I haven't had much water other than with medication because I don't want the pain and time of going to the toilet. Not good, but the stew was at least enough to survive for now.
Mind is numb
Noise and pain waking me up disturbing my sleep then waking fully and not being able to rest
Cold pasties

It’s an average day for my chronic pain which is to say that it’s persistent, it limits my mobility and by now I’ve been living with it long enough that every adjustment I learn to make is based on the overall condition getting worse. It has been progressively worse as time goes and I have a baseline level of pain which affects my daily life. When it gets worse I experience life with more limitations and a smaller existence physically, which informs my mental health and it can work the other way around.

I’m trying not to be blinded by all the parts of my life I feel weighed down by. I’m trying to be several versions of myself in discussions about rational and irrational thoughts. I’m trying to make all the voices of misery go away so I can get a grip and focus but that’s the version of me who is cruel to himself because he thinks that he’ll never become who he wants to be without the hard truth. So I hold on when I probably need to let go and be kind to myself but I can’t stand being that self indulgent creature who really wants to escape by living in his fantasy world. He entered that fantasy when he could no longer deal with reality. There are many doors but he can’t even begin to walk the corridor let alone find any keys.
I welcomed not being able to keep my eyes open. I think she was right about the night terrors because I can’t even move my duvet down as far as I did when I’m awake because it’s too painful
It’s not that what I ate was processed but it was awful. I’d left the slow cooker on the slow setting and the result was pretty disgusting.

Intense. I feel intense. I feel like I'm falling at terminal velocity and not even the earth can stop me. I'll burn through. I had to listen to On The Nature Of Daylight, Max Richter. I need to let this intensity out it is maddening. I've got so many thoughts and my emotions are everywhere. I miss my son. So much. Give me the strength to do what I haven't been able to do. These cellos remind me of Jacqueline du Pré. She played with everything her soul had. My food shopping is due and I'm fucking on a cliff. Please help me, whatever this fucking reality is and how it came to be. All of it. What the fuck is life. We're just here. What? Nobody knows! Authority, the wise, all of recorded time. Nobody knows and they can't know. We're supposed to just have shit to do. We're not allowed to know. The nature of everything is endless. A child knows this. I miss him. I wish everything would just heal. Please let everything heal.

I’m entering this as my current prescribed medication. If it changes I’ll update.

For two-ish years since last update, can’t remember exactly.

Cocodamol: 2 x 30mg @ 4 times daily 

Nortriptyline: 3 x 25mg @ nightly

Diazepam: 2 x 5mg @ nightly 

Lorazepam: 2 x 1mg @ nightly 

Amlodipine: 1/2 x 4mg @ daily 

Perindprol: 1 x 8mg @ daily 

Zolpidem 1 x 10mg nightly
Food shopping delivery. Had a few crackers. Was painful dragging the food. Delivery guy offered to help but I felt guilty because he had to go back and get the rest of the food

Consistently feel like a failure. It’s a horrible experience. I can’t concentrate and I’m always ashamed and overwhelmed by the reality of the challenges I’m facing. I’m ashamed of myself because I have a roof over my head, food, water. Light. I don’t have heating but that’s because it’s extortionate and I’m at the mercy of the energy companies. I don’t wash because of pain and feeling so low. So in some twisted sense at least I’m not paying for hot water apart from the standing charge. I haven’t used the washing machine unless I have no choice but again, low mood and pain already prevent that. Isolation can be good but not this much. I’m scared and paranoid about the outside world. I don’t ask for help because the last time I asked nobody did anything. So what is the point?! I’m defeated. I still have a plan to take my own life and I know that anger will be the reason I just say fuck this and do it. Give me the stability. And this is a private log so who am I asking? The other voices have been with me for a long time. I used to tell them I could see them and to do their worst to me but now I stay silent because fuck them. Occasionally they help me to prepare for the end but I laugh at them because they don’t think I’ll do it.
It consumes me. I forget to take the painkillers and suffer. Why do I do that?
Only source of heat is from the free electric blanket Octopus sent me. It’s always on at the moment. Doesn’t help with sleep and has woken me in pain and shortness of breath. I don’t want to be awake
Microwave porridge. Just to stop hunger pains

Value price or bad for you microwave meal. Get out of fridge estimate another minute longer because I'm poor and use a 750w microwave. Get out of microwave. Sofa, get it out of the way put spoon/fork in empty plastic tray, put on table. My gut is feeling horrible. Everything's horrible today. Only eating to tell my body to go away.
Usual painful areas are relentlessly hurting me. Painkillers hardly touch it
I'm a husk

I did eat something late last night. The temperature is brutally cold now meaning I keep my electric blanket on or for as long as 9 hours which is the longest setting. Woke up with Daniel Johnston's True Love Will Find You In The End in my head. I've been waking up with songs playing in my head for a while now and I definitely hadn't heard them before or during sleep. Especially Daniel Johnston.
I feel lost. I can't find any thoughts, I can only think about not being able to find any by typing here. I shut down when I'm like this but it's weirdly calming. An abyss

I slept longer overall but still woke up in pain. This isn’t the worst day for pain but it’s always there. I keep forgetting to take my meds and even though they make minimal difference they do something to get my pain down to lower levels. Other factors are responsible as always
I’ve been oscillating between distractions and raw anxiety which means that distractions can help but they’re not a long term solution

Pain and regular waking up meant I slept longer which helped but I’d rather have a solid amount of sleep obviously. I wasn’t sure if I was due painkillers before sleeping but then I forgot and keep forgetting to take any meds even with reminders. I’m usually in pain and think ok I need to take them but I can’t break the pattern for some reason

I thought I had an easy breakfast but it was too complicated and painful to make so I just had some custard my mum gave me when she came over yesterday. Then I had a bottle of kefir and a microwave meal. My stomach is not happy

Constantly waking in pain after nightmares I can't remember. My system is attacking me in my nightmares. The whole day will feel tainted as usual until I've taken my evening anxiety medication.  I need to take it on time but I keep forgetting
My body is screaming in all the places I usually feel pain. It's not the worst it could be but it's close. I need to take painkillers

I stared talking to him and he said that my mum can come over but he can only handle picking up and dropping off, no deviations. But his mum was too tired and went home so he was relieved but worried about her like he always worries about her and his dad. Their age, mortality and how he’s gonna tell me I won’t be able to cope if either of them go. I tried distracting myself and I’m still trying, living in worlds with people who don’t know me and I can’t talk to

The only thing I can feel aside from the usual chronic pain is the pit of my stomach telling me something is wrong because I'm paralysed with overwhelm and I am very low. I don't know what might trigger a spiral but I'm stuck at the bottom after poor sleep. I don't know when my therapist will contact me to resume therapy. It's the only hope I ever have but after the session I feel like I'm getting nowhere and my therapist can't direct me or give an opinion because ethics but even if I'm not always receptive I'd welcome her telling me what I need to do apart from the usual, be good to yourself, self-love, self-care etc. Those things make me cringe because I hate myself. I really wish I didn't live in a world where I have to love myself before I can love anyone else. I understand but all I have and all I am can love and care for my loved ones. I can't mention the one I miss the most it's too hard to type it.
My mum made me stew using my slow cooker and it’s the most nutritious meal I’ll have until it runs out

The extremity is related with mental state. The baseline is constant and even when more extreme pain happens on its own, today I can’t be sure but because I have to guess I think it’s by mental state exacerbating my physical condition

I made my therapist a new version of her website and I didn’t think about boundaries because I’ve been making people websites for a hobby. Her interpretation? Codependency. I get it, a client doesn’t normally do that stuff but I’m not trained in client counsellor ethics so I didn’t see why she’d have a problem. But I do now because I imagined our roles reversed. She didn’t say it because she is bound by her professional language. It wasn’t hard to read between her words. She got freaked out because she doesn’t understand how easy it is to clone any website on the public internet. Without knowing technology it would be unnerving. Obviously I can’t be completely certain she got freaked out and thought I saw our therapy sessions as more than counselling, but it’s the best guess based on her email informing me I’m no longer her client. I replied and made sure she has basic knowledge about how anyone can do exactly what I did, that I’d obviously take down the private link to the improved version of her website and there is nothing more to it. I apologised. What hit me hard has nothing to do with who she is particularly, because I don’t depend, pretend she’s my friend and nor have I ever even thought about counselling as anything more than an important part of my support network. I acted from the same place as the other websites I found and redesigned, to feel useful. Now I realise most people probably think alike. So I got rid of the other websites I redesigned because I imagined myself either emailing or calling them and saying hi I made your website better because it’s a hobby and I want to feel useful instead of suicidal. Talking of which, I will make sure I have a way out which doesn’t involve risk to anyone but myself. If people think you’re going to kill yourself they’re only interested if you’re dangerous to others. After they’ve established you’re not, all they’re allowed to do is listen to you talk, use bullshit language mirroring and perhaps say how difficult it sounds. That’s where we are guys, one of us is in crisis and needs help but only once I’ve hurt myself or attempted suicide. My friends, the world stops you never wake up again or there’s some fella at the gates of Eden to give you more shit before you’re allowed in or cast out. I think we need to get the sleep and not wake up again scenario

Dreamed my ex died again. Disturbed my whole day and then my therapist told me I’m not her client anymore. I woke up frequently in pain as usual. Selecting 3 is just because it’s tedious to swipe left
I still have stew. It’s healthy but I only had some to shut my stomach up
I’m deliberately trying to sleep as long as possible because I can’t face the day
Can’t eat just water
beans

Being awake is pure pain, mental pain. I wish my doctor could give me medication to cope and not SSRI or SNRI, I've had them all and they don't work. I have something, but I don't know what. But logically not knowing what my diagnosis is, it's been over 20 years and that means I have treatment resistant depression. So it's time to experiment with drugs not in the family of regular anti-depressants. I exist, but I exist in constant misery so the most humane solution I can propose is the type of drug which allows me to function but totally blunts my emotions. I asked for Lithium and it was considered but nothing came of it. Now I'm not with secondary mental health, primary care should have the power to help me. Because there will come a day when I switch and attempt to kill myself again and this time I have planned for it. There's no risk to anyone else, I know just enough science to know my plan will likely just kill me and it will be painful but not for long. I died inside years ago. I can't pass this on to my son
I wish I could just be sedated
A takeaway because my body and brain torture me more if I don't eat

Only just figured out what day it is. Somehow have not moved, not even when my system was screaming at me to go to the toilet, for a long period. But I can’t figure out how long. I’ve missed an entire day of medication which is strange because I usually at least take painkillers. I just took them. I’m not sure why I chose 8 instead of 10 but probably because I want to get this log out of the way. But I have to type this or I’ll forget. I’m shaking right now. System is still waking up and sending messages to my brain so I might have to log later today again.
I’m in a state of confusion like a fuge state

I’m very confused. I did wake up but not in the usual way. I’m not sure how long I slept but I remember it being Friday and because I looked I now know it’s Sunday so I don’t know what happened to Saturday but not even my bladder waking me which would usually trigger me to use the toilet got me up. I woke up to the sound of my robot vacuum cleaner and eventually got into a more upright position which is usually being horizontal with my back against my pillows and my neck pillow. Then my bladder I couldn’t ignore so I limped in the usual pain but more extreme because I missed an entire day of medication and used the toilet. Since then I’ve been on my sofa and my system is catching up with my brain I guess. I’ve taken painkillers
All I remember is drinking some water next to the sofa on my coffee table
Missed an entire day of medication. Have just taken painkillers
By now my pain is better than earlier just still constant which I expected
Microwave spaghetti

When it's this time of night, dark, the light dimmed very low, sometimes I feel less desperate. Not always, the right set of circumstances have to be in play. I ordered pizza and it came fast. The voices have calmed with me. It feels like being in stasis. The screen is set on dark mode. I'm not sure what else other than I took my evening anxiety meds which don't always work because tolerance builds over time and the only way I'd notice a difference is by forgetting to take them. It's happened before. Two days I missed and I was in a state of constant panic. Then I remembered a rifled through my meds and took the dose plus what I'd missed. I was desperate. Desperation is a daily feature for me. Fighting with people I can only just see from the corners of my eyes. Being alone and too afraid to go out. Even ordering food is stressful. Having to say that I can't come to the building door because poor mobility. It doesn't even matter to them but if I don't write it in the delivery instructions I can't guarantee I'll be able to answer the door in time. As it is I have to wait by the buzzer on a seat in case I can't get to the buzzer quickly enough. I've fallen over regularly. Every time I have to get up I use the sofa, walls. I mostly start falling backwards. It's all about making a plan because I need my dignity like anyone else. I started writing this because feeling a bit like I can relax doesn't happen often and it only ever happens in the evening. The pizza has helped my constant hunger pangs, settled the part of my system that's always anxious because I can't even face microwaving a simple ready meal because it's painful, I have no motivation and  don't want to be awake. I also have my sleeping pill to take which I can't imagine being without.
I think I forgot that I took painkillers but I was in a lot more pain so I assumed I needed to take more, which has helped.
I ordered a pizza which was expensive but I feel calmer somehow as I mentioned in my mood tracker
